totp.title: Autenticazione a due fattori

caldav.title: CalDav

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.setSuccess: L'avatar è stato impostato con successo!

deletion.title: Delete your Vikunja Account
deletion.text1: The deletion of your account is permanent and cannot be undone. We will delete all your namespaces, lists, tasks and everything associated with it.
deletion.text2: Per continuare, inserisci la tua password. Riceverai un'e-mail con ulteriori istruzioni.
deletion.requestSuccess: Richiesta riuscita. Riceverai un'e-mail con ulteriori istruzioni.
deletion.confirmSuccess: Hai confermato la cancellazione del tuo account. Elimineremo il tuo account tra tre giorni.
deletion.scheduled: Elimineremo il tuo account Vikunja il {date} ({dateSince}).
deletion.scheduledCancel: Per annullare l'eliminazione del tuo account, clicca qui.
deletion.scheduledCancelText: Per annullare l'eliminazione del tuo account, inserisci la password qui sotto:

export.title: Esporta i tuoi dati Vikunja
export.description: You can request a copy of all your Vikunja data. This include Namespaces, Lists, Tasks and everything associated to them. You can import this data in any Vikunja instance through the migration function.
export.descriptionPasswordRequired: Inserisci la tua password per procedere:
export.request: Richiedi una copia dei miei dati Vikunja
export.success: Hai richiesto con successo i tuoi dati Vikunja! Ti invieremo un'e-mail una volta che saranno pronti da scaricare.
export.downloadTitle: Scarica i tuoi dati Vikunja esportati

links.title: Link di condivisione
links.explanation: I link di condivisione consentono di condividere facilmente una lista con altri utenti che non hanno un account su Vikunja.
links.name: Nome (facoltativo)
links.nameExplanation: Tutte le azioni svolte tramite questo link di condivisione verranno visualizzate con questo nome.
links.passwordExplanation: Durante l'autenticazione, l'utente dovrà inserire questa password.
links.removeText: Sei sicuro di voler rimuovere questo link di condivisione? Non sarà più possibile accedere a questa lista con questo link. Non può essere ripristinato!

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.doneBucketHint: All tasks moved into this bucket will automatically marked as done.
kanban.doneBucketHintExtended: All tasks moved into the done bucket will be marked as done automatically. All tasks marked as done from elsewhere will be moved as well.
kanban.doneBucketSavedSuccess: The done bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.deleteLast: You cannot remove the last bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketText1: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket?
kanban.deleteBucketText2: This will not delete any tasks but move them into the default bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketSuccess: The bucket has been deleted successfully.
kanban.bucketTitleSavedSuccess: The bucket title has been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitSavedSuccess: The bucket limit been saved successfully.

namespace.title: Namespaces & Lists
namespace.noneAvailable: You don't have any namespaces right now.
namespace.noLists: This namespace does not contain any lists.
namespace.createList: Create a new list in this namespace.
namespace.search: Type to search for a namespace…

create.title: Create a new namespace
create.explanation: A namespace is a collection of lists you can share and use to organize your lists with. In fact, every list belongs to a namepace.

archive.archiveText: You won't be able to edit this namespace or create new lists until you un-archive it. This will also archive all lists in this namespace.
archive.unarchiveText: You will be able to create new lists or edit it.
archive.description: If a namespace is archived, you cannot create new lists or edit it.

delete.title: Delete "{namespace}"
delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this namespace and all of its contents?
delete.text2: Questo include tutte le liste e le attività e NON PUÒ ESSERE RIPRISTINATO!

create.title: Crea Un Filtro Salvato
create.description: A saved filter is a virtual list which is computed from a set of filters each time it is accessed. Once created, it will appear in a special namespace.

migrate.descriptionDo: Vikunja importerà tutti gli elenchi, le attività, le note, i promemoria e i file a cui hai accesso.
migrate.authorize: Per autorizzare Vikunja ad accedere al tuo account {name}, clicca il pulsante qui sotto.
migrate.alreadyMigrated1: Sembra che tu abbia già importato le tue cose da {name} il {date}.
migrate.alreadyMigrated2: Importare di nuovo è possibile, ma potrebbe creare duplicati. Sei sicuro?
migrate.confirm: Sono sicuro, per favore inizia adesso la migrazione!
migrate.importUpload: Per importare i dati da {name} in Vikunja, fai clic sul pulsante qui sotto per selezionare un file.

quickAddMagic.hint: You can use Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.title: Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.intro: When creating a task, you can use special keywords to directly add attributes to the newly created task. This allows to add commonly used attributes to tasks much faster.
quickAddMagic.label1: To add a label, simply prefix the name of the label with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.label2: Vikunja will first check if the label already exist and create it if not.
quickAddMagic.label3: To use spaces, simply add a " around the label name.
quickAddMagic.priority1: To set a task's priority, add a number 1-5, prefixed with a {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.priority2: The higher the number, the higher the priority.
quickAddMagic.assignees: To directly assign the task to a user, add their username prefixed with {prefix} to the task.
quickAddMagic.list1: To set a list for the task to appear in, enter its name prefixed with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.list2: This will return an error if the list does not exist.
quickAddMagic.date: Any date will be used as the due date of the new task. You can use dates in any of these formats:
quickAddMagic.dateWeekday: any weekday, will use the next date with that date
quickAddMagic.dateNth: will use the {day}th of the current month
quickAddMagic.dateTime: Combine any of the date formats with "{time}" (or {timePM}) to set a time.
